decisions.title: Q4 2025 Investment Allocation
decisions.description: Proposal to adjust the family portfolio allocation for Q4 2025 in response to market conditions and upcoming opportunities in sustainable energy sector.

proposals.title: Conservative Approach
proposals.description: Maintain current allocation with 5% increase to fixed income

proposals.title: Balanced Growth
proposals.description: Shift 10% from fixed income to sustainable energy ETFs

comments.author: Michael Reluna
comments.content: Given current market volatility, I recommend the Balanced Growth option.
